title: Pool Party (Turtleback School & Library Binding Edition) (Martha Speaks (Pb))
description: FOR USE IN SCHOOLS AND LIBRARIES ONLY. Every kid in town is going to the big pool party. But after Alice mistakes sun bronzer for sun block, Martha, Helen, and friends try to find a way for Alice to stil go to the party and feel comfortable in her very orange skin!

title: A Bare Bear
description: A book of homonyms, or words that sound the same but have very different meanings.A funny, thought-provoking introduction to homonyms and homophones, with crisply bright, contemporary illustrations. Meet a yack who can't stop yackety-yacking, a hare with huge hair and a bear who's, well, rather bare! Playing with language in a wonderfully fun and memorable way, this beautifully designed book will entertain and delight children everywhere.

title: 15 Dogs & a Cat Speak Out
description: Find out what pets really think! Luke the Detective Dog from the Hap Lynch mysteries - Murder Takes a Ride and Murder is for the Birds - hones his reporting skills as he interviews 15 dogs and a cat.

title: Women in Engineering (Women in Stem)
description: "Female engineers are hard at work designing the technology and infrastructure of our modern world. Women in Engineering looks at individuals who are making a major difference in this field."--Publisher's website.

title: Death Valley National Park (True Book)
description: Depicts the scenery and wildlife at Death Valley National Park and recounts the efforts to save the area from destruction by mining
